summary: Completed comprehensive testing of CardioCoach enhanced deep analysis with contextual comparison features. All baseline comparison functionality working correctly including 14-day baseline calculation, trend detection, relative terms usage, and calm non-alarmist tone in both English and French.
passed_tests: Backend: All 15 API tests passed (100% success rate)
calculate_baseline_metrics() function working correctly - computes averages from last 14 days of same workout type
Baseline includes: avg distance, duration, HR, pace/speed, zone distribution as specified
Comparison metrics calculated correctly: heart_rate_vs_baseline, distance_vs_baseline, pace_vs_baseline with status indicators
Deep analysis receives baseline data in context when deep_analysis=true
AI response includes structured sections: EXECUTION ASSESSMENT, TREND DETECTION, PHYSIOLOGICAL CONTEXT, ACTIONABLE INSIGHT
AI response uses relative terms: 'slightly', 'consistent with', 'in line with', 'modest' - maintaining calm tone
AI response maintains calm, precise, non-alarmist tone - no alarmist words detected
POST /api/coach/analyze with deep_analysis=true includes baseline metrics correctly
Analyze workout button triggers deep analysis with baseline context successfully
Frontend integration: Dashboard → Workout Detail → Analyze Button → Coach Page with auto-analysis works perfectly
Workout detail page shows prominent 'ANALYZE' button in header
Auto-analysis triggers correctly when arriving from workout (deep_analysis=true sent to API)
Deep analysis provides expert-level structured response with baseline comparison
Messages show 'Workout analyzed' badge when linked to workout
Manual message input works correctly for follow-up questions
French language support working: AI responds in French with trend keywords 'amélioration', 'progression', 'tendance', 'surcharge', 'récupération'
EMERGENT_LLM_KEY configured and working correctly for both English and French analysis
success_percentage: Backend: 100% (15/15 tests passed), Frontend: 100% (all baseline comparison features working), Integration: 100% (workout analysis flow working end-to-end)
